ideas.title: Humans&, a ‘human-centric’ AI startup founded by Anthropic, xAI, Google alums, raised $480M seed round
ideas.description: Humans&, a startup that believes AI should empower people, not replace them, has reportedly raised a $480 million seed round at a $4.48 billion valuation.

tips: Use cinematic B-roll of founders in tech environments
Include archival/interview footage with subtle motion graphics
Design chapter markers that feel like documentary transitions

visualDirection.description: Muted tech-inspired color palette (slate grays, deep blues, soft whites). Asymmetrical composition with documentary-style framing. Sans-serif typography with clean, modern lines. Subtle parallax motion graphics. Aesthetic references: HBO documentaries, VICE tech narratives, Apple product launch videos.

exampleOutline: Closing: Call to reimagine AI's role

ideas.title: Indian vibe-coding startup Emergent triples valuation to $300M with $70M fundraise
ideas.description: The funding comes as the startup claims it has scaled ARR to $50 million, and is targeting $100 million by April 2026.
hooks: How This Indian Startup Just Disrupted Tech Funding
From $0 to $300M: The Emergent AI Story

tips: Use dynamic screen recordings of funding announcement
Create animated graphics showing valuation growth

visualDirection.description: Bold, tech-forward design with electric blue and deep indigo color palette. Geometric motion graphics illustrating financial growth. Sharp, modern sans-serif typography with dynamic data visualization. Picture-in-picture founder interview with animated funding milestone overlays. Clean, high-contrast design that feels both professional and exciting.

exampleOutline: Context: Indian tech ecosystem and AI innovation landscape (1-2 min)
Emergent's Journey: Funding story and key milestones (3-4 min)
Technical Deep Dive: How they achieved rapid growth (2-3 min)

ideas.title: ChatGPT apps are about to be the next big distribution channel: Here’s how to build one
ideas.description: A step-by-step guide to jumping in and building your first ChatGPT app
hooks: ChatGPT Apps: Your Next Million-Dollar Opportunity?
Build a ChatGPT App in 60 Minutes Live
Unlock the Future of AI Distribution Now

tips: Use YouTube Live's interactive Q&A features throughout stream
Prepare pre-submitted audience questions to maintain engagement
Enable live chat pinning for key technical moments

visualDirection.description: High-energy cyberpunk-inspired color palette with electric blues and neon accents. Dynamic split-screen layout showcasing live coding + real-time audience interaction. Futuristic, technical typography with glitch/digital overlay effects. Motion graphics that pulse and react to stream energy. References: Blade Runner UI, GitHub dark mode, Figma design system animations.

exampleOutline: Introduction: Why ChatGPT Apps Matter Now
Live Coding: Building Your First App

ideas.title: ChatGPT apps are about to be the next big distribution channel: Here’s how to build one
ideas.description: A step-by-step guide to jumping in and building your first ChatGPT app
hooks: Build Your First ChatGPT App in 60 Minutes
The ChatGPT App Gold Rush Starts Now
Turn AI into Your Next Side Hustle

tips: Use screen recording for live coding segments
Include picture-in-picture of developer explaining code
Create clear chapter markers for tutorial steps

visualDirection.description: High-energy tech aesthetic with neon blue/purple gradients, dynamic code-inspired motion graphics, clean sans-serif typography, futuristic UI overlays, rapid transitions between demonstration screens, subtle glitch effects to highlight key moments

exampleOutline: Introduction: Why ChatGPT Apps Are the Next Big Thing
The Current Landscape of AI App Development

ideas.title: Here are the 55 US AI startups that raised $100M or more in 2025
ideas.description: Last year was monumental for the AI industry in the U.S. and beyond. How will 2025 compare?
hooks: The AI Investment Landscape Just Got Crazy

tips: Use dynamic screen recordings showing funding data visualizations
Create animated infographics to break down complex investment trends

visualDirection.description: High-contrast tech-forward design with electric blue and charcoal gray palette. Dynamic motion graphics revealing data points. Clean sans-serif typography with technical precision. Animated network/connection visual metaphors representing startup ecosystems. Sleek, futuristic aesthetic blending data visualization with editorial design.

exampleOutline: Opening: Dramatic AI Investment Landscape Overview (5s)
Closing CTA: Engage with Research & Community (30s)
